00150                                                         CPixelGroup& PixelGroup);

00276                 bool AdjustAlignment(const char* str, CPoint2D<int>& Pos);
00277                 int GetSizeString(const char* str);
00278                 /* Plots a single character to image at given position, alignment is done according 
00279                         to the value in m_FontAlignment, manipulated by the method SetFontAlignment().
00280                         Use PlotString() to plot a string of characters.
00281                         @param ch Character to be plotted in image.
00282                         @param Pos Position of character.
00283                         @param Img Image to plot character into.
00284                         @return False, if the active font is not valid.
00285                         @see PlotString
00286                         @see SetFontAlignment */
00287                 bool PlotChar(char ch, const CPoint2D<int>& Pos, CStdImage& Img);
